programme.desc: Sestry: Olinka a Betinka sú sestry, obe slobodné, bez rodiny, dôchodkyne. Od smrti svojich rodičov žijú samé v ich rodnom dome a jedna o druhú sa príkladne starajú. Pre celú dedinu sú tak trochu čudáčkami. Ich dlhoročný fungujúci sesterský vzťah naruší príchod nového suseda Pištu...

programme.title: Policajné prípady
programme.desc: Problémový pacient: Doktorka Vojtková (44) privolá políciu kvôli vyčíňaniu pacienta Laca (44), ktorý nechce opustiť nemocnicu. Napriek doktorkiným slovám, že pacient je vyliečený sa Laco cíti zle a odmieta odísť domov. Do práce v tom čase prichádza zdravotná sestra Hana (26), ktorej Laco vyznáva lásku a tvrdí, že chce v nemocnici zostať kvôli nej. Houseboat: Polícia je privolaná neznámou ohlasovateľkou kvôli vlámaniu. Stretávajú vystrašenú Simonu (17), ktorá políciu síce nevolala, no čaká v bezpečí na priateľa Ondreja (18).Ten išiel na vlastnú päsť chytiť zlodeja, ktorý sa mu vlámal do houseboatu. Pred inkriminovaným houseboatom sa stretáva polícia s Ondrejom, ktorý sa správa podozrivo. V houseboate polícia objaví zviazanú Moniku (27). Nezodpovedná matka: Alica (62) privolá políciu. Má strach o vnuka Janka (6), ktorého je opatrovníčkou. Janka zverila na deň jeho mame Kataríne (26), no tá ho podľa dohody nevrátila späť. Polícia a Alica nájdu v Kataríninom byte opitého Dušana (31). Vyjde najavo, že Dušan podal Jankovi alkohol a zamkol ho v kúpeľni. Súkromné očko: Karolína (32) má podozrenie, že je už niekoľko dní sledovaná. Jej priateľ Filip (34) jej neverí, no Karolína ukazuje polícii podozrivé čierne auto. Polícia v aute objavuje Radoslava (43), ktorý obvinenia popiera. Usvedčia ho Karolínine fotky vo fotoaparáte na zadnom sedadle.

programme.title: Reflex
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Michaela má 6 detí s dvomi mužmi, s druhým mužom býva u svokrovcov, keďže si nemôžu dovoliť vlastné bývanie. Jej 14 ročná dcéra Silvia však odluku od otca ťažko zvláda a často uteká aj na 2 dni preč z domu. Gizka sa rozhodne poslať ju na liečenie a učí celú rodinu ako takúto situáciu zvládať.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Policajná akadémia II.: László tesne pred skúškami na mestského policajta trénuje s Františkom streľbu a kondičku. Ildikó chce oslavovať s Gergelym jeho narodeniny. Ten však má iné plány a indície nasvedčujú, že medzi ním a Milkou to divoko iskrí. František popri tréningu vyzerá pani Jarmilku, aby jej všetko vysvetlil a nebol za chrapúňa. László pri streľbe zo vzduchovky síce netrafí terč, ale predsa trafí presne a odhalí malé tajomstvo… František sa v depresii z toho opíja v bývalej reštaurácii, kde Marta organizuje špeciálny indický čajový dejchánek. Zuzana s Andrejkou by tu v tom istom čase chceli nakrúcať svoj telešoping. Medzi Martou a Zuzanou vzniká zásadný konflikt. Bufetár upozorní susedov na podozrivé indivíduá, ktoré po súmraku chodia do parku. Vyzerá to na tajné stretnutia Gergelyho a Milky a to treba preveriť! Žiaľ, manželky chlapom zatrhnú tajnú akciu a tak László zapojí kolegov z polície. Čo odhalí razia v parku? A ako dopadne František, keď ho Zuzana donúti vybaviť jej priestor na nakrúcanie telešopingu "chlapským spôsobom"?

programme.title: Kuchyňa
programme.desc: Mladý talentovaný kuchár z Bratislavy Michal (Samo Spišák) po nešťastnej prezentácii na internete, ktorú nechtiac spôsobil Čeky (Marián Čekovský), príde o prácu v hlavnom meste a odchádza na Liptov. Čeky tam vlastní slovenskú kolibu, ktorú vedie bývalá televízna hviezda, slávny český šéfkuchár Zdeněk (Martin Dejdar). Michal chce začať nový život, ale stretáva sa s neočakávanými prekážkami: šikanovaním zo strany šéfa, posmeškami zo strany kolegov, nepriateľstvom manažérky Lucie (Gabriela Marcinková), s ktorou strávi hneď prvú noc po príchode, žiarlivosťou čašníka Janka (Jakub Gogál) a neskrývaným obdivom čašníčky Aničky (Silvia Holečková). Do toho celý tím pripravuje večeru pre nenávideného konkurenta Kočandera (Richard Stanke) a Michal chce predviesť svoje kuchárske umenie... Michal (Samuel Spišák), je mladý a talentovaný kuchár, ktorý rozbieha svoju kariéru v exkluzívnej bratislavskej reštaurácii. Na dôležitej akcii spôsobí trapas, a tak je nútený odísť. Typický mestský chalan sa odrazu ocitá v prostredí, ktoré ani nemohlo byť odlišnejšie od toho, na čo bol predtým zvyknutý. Šéfkuchár Zdeněk (Martin Dejdar) vedie skutočne výbornú reštauráciu so slovenskými špecialitami a Michal dostane šancu znova sa postaviť do kuchyne. Nové miesto mu prinieslo kolegov, akých by na bývalom mieste nikdy nemal - celebritného majiteľa, bývalého hviezdneho kuchára, ktorý prišiel o kariéru kvôli problémom s alkoholom a niekoľkým rozvodom, ale aj niekdajšiu hokejovú hviezdu, ktorá dnes namiesto puku naháňa zemiaky po panvici. Michal sa ocitne v hľadáčiku manažérky Lucie (Gabriela Marcinková). Pre mladú a krásnu ženu je chalan z hlavného mesta šancou na nový život po rozchode so ženatým milencom. Množstvo humorných situácií prinesú nielen zamestnanci a hostia reštaurácie, ale aj súperenie s konkurenčným podnikom.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.desc: Hodinový manžel: Miro a Katka sú manželmi vyše dvoch rokov. Žijú na dedine v rodinnom dome spolu s Mirovou mamou Vierou. Tá je šťastná, že ich má pri sebe, to však Katke lezie na nervy. Navyše Miro je technický antitalent, takže všetky potrebné opravy okolo domu riešia ženy. Jedného dňa sa do susedstva prisťahuje fešný a zručný vdovec Vlado...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.desc: Nora začne zvádzať Zorbu a dokonca sa jej podarí vzbudiť jeho záujem. Michal sa rozčúli na Cilku, že bez jeho vedomia zamestnala Viktora vo fabrike. Paule ani Alžbetine varovanie nezabráni prežiť ďalší krásny deň s Viktorom, a to ich opäť k sebe o krôčik priblíži.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.desc: Spolužiačka: Róbert je majiteľom menšej reštaurácie. S manželkou Zuzanou žije už 20 rokov, majú sedemnásťročnú dcéru Martinu. V poslednom čase sa mu prestalo dariť. Jedného dňa sa rozhodol povedať rodine pravdu...

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.desc: Spolubývajúci: Medzihorskí a Boríkoví sú dlhoroční susedia, ktorí si spolu výborne vychádzajú. Onedlho sa majú stať príbuznými, lebo ich deti sa budú brať. Nečakaná udalosť spôsobí, že zo susedov sa stanú spolubývajúci...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.desc: Ženské záležitosti: Marcela a Peter spolu chodia niekoľko mesiacov. Peter už má za sebou jedno nevydarené manželstvo, z ktorého má 17 ročnú dcéru Petru. Tá sa cíti byť zanedbávaná a dáva to Marcele a Petrovi náležite najavo... Marcela, ktorá nemôže mať deti, sa snaží Petre porozumieť...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.desc: Nora vyberie za Borisovým chrbtom z účtu fabriky peniaze pre Romana. Ján sa rozhodne vydediť Romana, čo prispeje k rozpadu jeho vzťahu s Oľgou. Stretnutie Michala s Paulou skončí veľkou hádkou, v skutočnosti však jeden druhému veľmi chýbajú.

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.desc: Hornú Dolnú zachváti kalamita! Ale tento rok je nejaká čudná...

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.desc: Horná Dolná chystá zabíjačku! Príde totiž delegácia z Ministerstva životného prostredia. Kde však vziať vhodnú sviňu?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.desc: Muži v Hornej Dolnej majú strach! Ženy sa im chcú pomstiť za všetky veľkonočné príkoria.

programme.title: Dobre vedieť!
programme.desc: V dnešnej časti zabojujú s kapitánmi o výhru herci Zuzana Fialová a David Hartl. Súťažná, no najmä zábavná relácia, v ktorej proti sebe nastúpia tímy Juraja Kemku a Vlada Kobielskeho. Každý z kapitánov musí za pomoci svojho hosťa zistiť správne odpovede na netradičné otázky, pričom často vznikajú vtipné situácie. Do tuhého ide najmä v závere relácie. Súperiace dvojice musia zodpovedať spoločnú otázku, pri ktorej stavia sumu, ktorej výšku súperi nevedia. Víťazom sa stane tím s vyššou nahranou sumou.

programme.title: Adela show
programme.desc: Talkshow Adely Banášovej

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Michaela má 6 detí s dvomi mužmi, s druhým mužom býva u svokrovcov, keďže si nemôžu dovoliť vlastné bývanie. Jej 14 ročná dcéra Silvia však odluku od otca ťažko zvláda a často uteká aj na 2 dni preč z domu. Gizka sa rozhodne poslať ju na liečenie a učí celú rodinu ako takúto situáciu zvládať.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.desc: Hodinový manžel: Miro a Katka sú manželmi vyše dvoch rokov. Žijú na dedine v rodinnom dome spolu s Mirovou mamou Vierou. Tá je šťastná, že ich má pri sebe, to však Katke lezie na nervy. Navyše Miro je technický antitalent, takže všetky potrebné opravy okolo domu riešia ženy. Jedného dňa sa do susedstva prisťahuje fešný a zručný vdovec Vlado...

programme.title: Policajné prípady
programme.desc: Babka na strome: Chovankyňa hospica Terézia (71) vylezie na strom a odmieta zliezť, kým jej nesľúbia, že ju pustia domov. Jej syn ju tam zavrel, ale mal ju doopatrovať. Prichádza jej vnučka Lucia (26), ktorá dostala babkin byt, ale netušila, že jej otec takto babku upratal. Lucia si vezme babku do svojho bytu, aby ju doopatrovala. Falošné telefóny: Polícia prichytí teenagerku Kláru (13) a jej kamaráta Samuela (14) ako sa bijú na námestí. Klára má plný vak falošných mobilných telefónov a peňazí. Predáva ich pre svoju mamu Karolínu (36), ktorá je drogovo závislá. Kradnúce dieťa: Polícia prenasleduje žiaka Dominika (12), ktorý ukradol deku. Dominik mieri do kotolne, kde žije s bezdomovkyňou Miladou (54). Milada dostala zápal pľúc a preto Dominik pre ňu ukradol deku. Dominik s ňou žije, lebo doma má len despotického alkoholického otca. Nechcený nápadník: Tunisan Ahmed Gharbi (23) je napadnutý mužom Jánom Pavlíkom (48). Ján tvrdí, že je to zlodej. V skutočnosti je to priateľ Jánovej dcéry Ingrid (19). Ján sa nedokáže zmieriť s tým, že Ingrid chodí s Ahmedom a preto jej zobral telefón a zamkol ju doma.

programme.title: Uragán
programme.desc: Legendárna markizácka televízna šou, z ktorej vzišli mnohé nezabudnuteľné postavičky ako sexy fúzačka pani Mária, malý samozvaný intelektuál zo základnej školy Mirko, nadčasová (nielen) hiphopová skupina Krímeš či azda najznámejší internacionálny, nedobrovoľne vtipný tandem, ktorý tvoria Slovák ako repa František Stromokocúr a jeho štíhlejšie maďarské druhé ja László Komárom! Touto vtipnou, takmer hodinovou spŕškou skvelej zábavy s Petrom Marcinom a Andym Krausom divákov vtedy i dnes sprevádzala krehká blondínka s neprepočuteľným hlasom Zuzana Šikulová.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Hurá na hokej!: František, veľký hokejový fanúšik, daroval Lászlovi vstupenky na 1. zápas Slovenska na Majstrovstvách sveta. Počíta s tým, že László ho berie so sebou. László však vstupenky niekam založil a nevie ich nájsť. Zuzana rieši svoj nový biznis a má dohodnuté stretnutie so Švajdom, aby jej poradil, ako nakrúcať profesionálne videá. Kým Marta nájde virguľou stratené vstupenky, chlapi musia ísť na zápas do Košíc autom, ktoré sa však pokazí. Uvidia László s Františkom aspoň niečo zo zápasu v televízi, keď v dome prebieha aj revízia elektrických rozvodov? Ako dopadne návšteva Patrika Švajdu, keď sa o nej dozvie Marta aj Ildikó, ktorá je jeho nadšený fanúšik?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Jelenia oslava: František sa opäť nezhodne so Zuzanou. Plánovaná oslava jubilea prvej trofeje sa zmení na obed v lacnej poľovníckej reštaurácii. Chlapi dostanú odstupné z Lesnej správy. Susedia chystajú pre Františka prekvapenie, tajne vojdú cez balkón a schovajú sa. Po návrate domov Zuzana v hádke všetkých ohovorí. Vyžehlia sa urážky varením jelenieho gulášu? Františka poteší, že Farkašová nezabudla na jeho výročie. Dozvie sa však, že Lászlove odstupné je nepomerne vyššie ako to jeho. Ako je to možné? Podarí sa zachrániť oslavu jubilea? A ako bude chutiť guláš, ktorý dovarila Ildikó?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Krstný otec: Milka má problém, krstní rodičia sú veľmi „vlezlí“ a rozmaznávajú Evana. Zuzana zistí, že nemajú dosť peňazí na dovolenku. Chce, aby si František požičal od Lászla. Milka chce, aby Lászlovi a Ildikó vysvetlili, že k nim nemôžu tak často chodiť na dlhé návštevy. Ildikó nabalila ďaľší balík vecičiek zo secondhandu pre Evana. František a Ildikó spoločne organizujú deň detí Miestneho úradu a sexy referentka prinesie Lászlovi peniaze na zabezpečenie účinkujúcich. Odpustí Milka Evanovým krstným rodičom? Zvládne László opateru krstňaťa „naostro“? Nájdu sa stratené peniaze?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Pohreb: Obom rodinám sa podarí zarobiť na krátke dovolenky. Poštár však priniesie šeky na zaplatenie. Nahnevaní susedia ho vyhodia a už ho v živote nechcú vidieť! O to väčší je šok, keď Marta prinesie oznam, že poštár zomrel. Z výčitiek svedomia sa František rozhodne na poštárovom pohrebe zahrať jeho obľúbenú pesničku. Andrejka sa rozišla s Gergelym a bojí sa to povedať Ildikó. Čo mala Marta Sladká s poštárom, keď sa teší na dedičstvo? Ako príjmu pozostalí pesničku pre zosnulého? A ako sa skončí celá táto tragická udalosť?

programme.title: To najlepšie zo Susedov
programme.desc: Seriál SR.

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.desc: Keď Ďuro rozbije Erike záhradného trpaslíka, pocíti Erikin hnev. V snahe o nápravu sa dopustí množstva ďalších chýb a zločinov... Jedným z nich je aj to, že do dediny privedie zvláštneho tvora...

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.desc: Keď nešťastný Tunel oznámi občanom, že čaká dieťa, Erike začnú silno tikať biologické hodiny. Ďuro má veľmi vážny problém...

programme.title: Uragán
programme.desc: Legendárna markizácka televízna šou, z ktorej vzišli mnohé nezabudnuteľné postavičky ako sexy fúzačka pani Mária, malý samozvaný intelektuál zo základnej školy Mirko, nadčasová (nielen) hiphopová skupina Krímeš či azda najznámejší internacionálny, nedobrovoľne vtipný tandem, ktorý tvoria Slovák ako repa František Stromokocúr a jeho štíhlejšie maďarské druhé ja László Komárom! Touto vtipnou, takmer hodinovou spŕškou skvelej zábavy s Petrom Marcinom a Andym Krausom divákov vtedy i dnes sprevádzala krehká blondínka s neprepočuteľným hlasom Zuzana Šikulová.

programme.title: Partička
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.desc: Superotec: Manželia Lujza a Karol majú takmer dvojročného syna. Keďže dvojica prišla o jeden príjem, Karol trávi v práci čoraz viac času, aby uživil rodinu. Lujza sa cíti osamelá, preto vyhľadáva v okolí mamičky na materskej. No a popritom spozná aj jedného muža...

programme.title: Afrika 2007 - Slnko a tiene Afriky
programme.sub-title: Cestovateľský príbeh Henricha Krejču a Matúša Sirotu
programme.desc: Cestovateľský príbeh Henricha Krejču a Matúša Sirotu

programme.title: Tvoja tvár znie povedome
programme.desc: Veľkolepá zábavná šou plná fenomenálnych premien, skvelých hudobných čísel a obľúbených slovenských hviezd v roliach svetových, ale aj domácich ikon populárnej hudby. V siedmej sérii sa divákom predstaví úplne nová a nemenej skvelá osmička osobností slovenského šoubiznisu. Svoje herecké, spevácke a tanečné schopnosti, ale v neposlednom rade aj zmysel pre humor, predvedú obľúbené herečky z markizáckych seriálových hitov – Viki Ráková zo Susedov, Lívia Bielovič z Druhej šance a Natália Puklušová z Oteckov, ktoré doplní populárna stand-up komička Simona Salátová. Mužskú štvoricu súťažiacich budú tvoriť víťaz ostatnej SuperStar Adam Pavlovčin, známy hudobník a famózny huslista Ondrej Kandráč, talentovaný herec a spevák Matúš Kolárovský, ktorý sa dostal do povedomia divákov v úspešnom seriáli Pán profesor, a napokon ďalší mladý herec Karol Tóth, ktorého diváci uvidia aj ako lekára v druhej sérii obľúbeného seriálu Druhá šanca. Na súťažiacich sa pozrie a ich výkony bude hodnotiť herečka Zuzana Kubovčíková Šebová, spevák kapely Desmod Mário „Kuly“ Kollár a po prvýkrát sa v porote predstavia hudobník Marián Čekovský a bojovník MMA Attila Végh. Šou bude opäť pod moderátorskou taktovkou Martina Nikodýma.

programme.title: Sekerovci
programme.desc: Mladý pár Júlia a Jano sa práve nasťahovali k Janovým rodičom do malého mestečka Timravany. Júlia si uvedomí, žev chaose okolo prenášania vecí celkom zabudla, že má termín odovzdania francúzskeho prekladu. Musí v rýchlosti dokončíť prácu, ale podmienky v domácnosti Sekerovcov jej neprajú. Zdá sa, že sa proti nej spikol celý svet – doma je rušno, má na krku zhovorčivú svokru a navyše sa jej nedopatrením pokazí počítač. Netuší, že aj v zapadákove neexistuje problém, na ktorý by sa nenašlo riešenie. Jano sa medzitým snaží vyhnúť práci v otcovom mäsiarstve, od ktorej si už za tie roky odvykol. Nechtiac spôsobí, že otec dá po rokoch napomínania výpoveď Janovmu mladšiemu bratovi. Pipo je nešťastný. Hoci mu vrodená lenivosť hovorí, že byť nezamestnaný je výhodné, rodičia mu dávajú najavo, že naveky im na krku ostať nemôže... Neberte si nič na sekeru. Sekerovci žijú v Timravanoch, malom mestečku v nešpecifikovanom kúte Slovenska, dostatočne ďaleko od Bratislavy. Miestni si na označenie ""mesto"" potrpia, v skutočnosti však Timravany vykazujú všetky znaky dediny. V centre diania sitkomu sú manželia Vincent a Jarmila Sekerovci. Vincent je najväčší škrob v meste a jeho najčastejšia veta znie ""Určite je to drahé"". Jarmila je pokojná a dobrá duša, rada háčkuje a vedie spevokol. Manželia spoločne vedú rodinný biznis – malé mäsiarstvo. Sekerovci majú tri deti. Dcéra Betka je v tínedžerskom veku, pohŕda rodinou a čo najskôr sa chce dostať z malého mestečka preč. Syn Pipo je futbalista, rebel a trošku ""vyšinutý"". Pomáha otcovi v mäsiarstve. Najstarší syn Jano sa po rokoch strávených v Bratislave rozhodol vrátiť do rodného mestečka a spolu so svojou snúbenicou si chcú postaviť dom. Zatiaľ však bývajú u rodičov...

programme.title: Sekerovci
programme.desc: Jano prinesie domov model supermoderného domu, ktorý by si spolu s Júliou rád postavil na pozemku vedľa domu Sekerovcov. Júlia je z návrhu architekta nadšená. Napriek Janovmu varovaniu ukáže model svokrovcom, no tí majú z bielej dokonalej kocky celkom opačný dojem. Jano a Júlia musia čeliť dileme – vyhovejú vkusu rodičov, alebo si postavia hniezdočko, o akom vždy snívali, podľa svojich predstáv? Betka zatiaľ rieši problém s prísnou učiteľkou chémie. S prosbou o pomoc sa obráti na toho najpovolanejšieho človeka – na Pipa. Miestny Casanova zapojí do akcie svoj neprekonateľný šarm, ktorému ešte žiadna žena neodolala.

programme.title: Sekerovci
programme.sub-title: Mop alebo trop. Komediálny seriál SR (2012).
programme.desc: Júlia po prvý raz pomáha svokre s domácimi prácami a snaží sa pred ňou predviesť. Každá z nich však má inú predstavu o tom, čo je poriadok a ako ho najlepšie docieliť. Zdá sa, že puntičkársku Sekerovú neuspokojí žiadna Júliina metóda upratovania. Júlia musí improvizovať. Začína sa vojna mopov. Pipo sa udomácnil v novej izbe, ktorú musí zdieľať so sestrou Betkou, aby mal mladý pár vlastné súkromie. Pri tréningu futbalového tímu s hrôzou zistí, že si omylom obliekol Betkine ružové nohavičky. Výsmechu chlapov odolá len tak-tak. Príde pri tom na omnoho horšiu vec. Zdá sa, že ho spolužitie so sestrou pomaly, ale isto mení z hustého playboya na rozcítené dievča.

programme.title: Sekerovci
programme.desc: Júlia sa cez internet rozpráva so svojou mamou, ktorá si na svetovom koncertnom turné užíva krásy Japonska. Svokra Sekerová Júliinu mamu zo slušnosti pozve na návštevu. Netuší, že ju excentrická harfistka Zlatica vezme za slovo a skutočne navštívi Timravany. Usporiadaný rodinný stereotyp Sekerovcov je za pár sekúnd v troskách. Jediný člen rodiny, ktorého Zlaticine nepredvídateľné správanie fascinuje, je Pipo. Okamžite sa so Zlaticou zblíži a stane sa z nich nerozlučná dvojica, po ktorej ostáva všade samá spúšť.

programme.title: 2 na 1
programme.desc: V ďalšej časti si Adela s Danom vezmú „na paškál“ obľúbeného moderátora Marcela Forgáča. Zábavná relácia, v ktorej si dvaja moderátori - Adela Vinczeová a Dano Dangl - „podajú“ vždy jedného zaujímavého hosťa. Ten bude musieť absolvovať sériu rôznych úloh, skúšok alebo výziev, ktoré ho dostanú do neštandardných a nie celkom komfortných situácií. Diváci sa môžu tešiť na vtipné momenty a reakcie, ktoré vzniknú pod vplyvom nečakaných udalostí.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Asistent: Zuzana je príliš zamestnaná svojím internetovým obchodom a Františka rozčuľuje neporiadok v domácnosti. Veď to u nich vyzerá akoby ich vykradli. Aby ho upokojila, Zuzana mu predstaví svojho nového asistenta. Mladý muž, Bystrík, je o 30 rokov mladší a 30 kíl chudší ako František a ten sa vôbec neupokojí, naopak začne ho zožierať žiarlivosť. Vyhlási súťaž a postaví Lászla ako protikandidáta na miesto asistenta. László má problém, lebo si nepamätá dôležité dátumy, čo mimoriadne rozrušilo Ildikó a prítomnosť mladého „modela“ tiež ohrozuje jeho manželstvo. Podarí sa Lászlovi predať viac Zuzaniných emulzií na rast vlasov? Ako prežijú Zuzana, Ildikó a Marta prítomnosť atraktívneho mladého muža? A prežije László svoju snahu o prekonanie vlastných hendikepov v marketingovej komunikácii?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Kopýtko: László má problémy s upchatým WC a u Františka zas netečie voda. Marta Sladká má dohodnuté rande s novým milencom, ale v jej byte sa nekúri, a tak potrebuje prichýliť u Lászla. Ildikó s tým však zásadne nesúhlasí. László je ochotný pomôcť, ale pod podmienkou, že bude v byte počas romantického stretnutia prítomný. Zuzana má problém, lebo jej bezšnúrová naparovacia žehlička, ktorá by mala žehliť oblečenie bezpečne aj priamo na tele, vykazuje výrobnú chybu. Ako dopadne rande Marty za prítomnosti Lászla a ako to prežije Ildikó, ak na to príde? Pozná Martin milenec aj Zuzanu? A kto si chce vlastne vyhodiť z kopýtka?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Obraz: Zuzana má šancu preraziť na rumunský trh, ale schôdzka s rumunským manažérom koliduje s Milkinou hosťujúcou prednáškou. László spoznáva v novinách obraz, ktorý kedysi pri sťahovaní daroval Františkovi. Autorom je vraj významný maliar z rodiny Ildikó a obraz je veľmi cenný. Rozhodne sa vypýtať si obraz naspäť, veď peniaze si môžu rozdeliť. Musia ho však najprv za každú cenu získať naspäť od starostu, ktorému ho František medzitým daroval na narodeniny. Ako ďaleko sú susedia ochotní zájsť pre peniaze? Obetujú vernosť Františkovej mamičky, či lásku jeho dcéry? Budú ochotní dopustiť sa zločinu?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Akčné hrdinky: Zuzana má problém s počítačom. Niekto jej tam nainštaloval akčnú hru a prestavil klávesnicu, takže nemôže spracovávať svoje objednávky. František tvrdí, že o ničom nevie. László však opíše nočné „hráčske orgie“ vo Františkovom byte doučovateľovi maďarčiny, ktorého si pomýli s IT odborníkom na opravu Zuzaninho PC. Ten nadobudne pocit, že Zuzana podniká v eskorte a za svoje služby chce byť vyplatený v naturáliách. Ildikó má problémy s oteckom svojho žiaka, ktorý protestuje proti päťke svojho syna. František v telefóne zastúpi Lászla, aby otecka „uzemnil“. Ubráni sa Zuzana dotieravému doučovateľovi? Kto zachráni Ildikó a Lászla, ktorých chce inzultovať rozzúrený otecko? Budú to amazonky ako z akčnej hry? A akú to bude mať dohru v spálňach našich hrdinov?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Ruské dedičstvo: László má u Zuzany dlh a bude za ňu umývať chodbu, aby ho odpracoval. František má problémy s políciou za prekročenie rýchlosti. Sladká dostane list z Ruska a susedia zistia, že bude dediť. Dúfajú, že ak budú k Marte „pozorní“ aj im z toho niečo "kvapne". Marta sa naozaj chce podeliť a susedia už nakupujú luxusné veci. Aký dopad bude mať dedičstvo na ich budúcnosť?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.desc: Chlpáči ukradnú Ďurovi auto a havarujú s ním. Rapidečka je na kašu. Ďuro ide najprv tvrdo po nich, ale potom ho dostane depka zo straty blízkej bytosti...

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.desc: Hornú Dolnú napadne nebezpečný hmyz, ktorý spôsobuje slepotu. Spolu s hmyzom sa v dedine zjaví aj entomológ - expert na vzácne druhy chrobákov. Len on jediný dokáže vyrobiť protijed...

programme.title: Smotánka
programme.desc: Nevšedný svet kľúčovou dierkou

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Hurá na hokej!: František, veľký hokejový fanúšik, daroval Lászlovi vstupenky na 1. zápas Slovenska na Majstrovstvách sveta. Počíta s tým, že László ho berie so sebou. László však vstupenky niekam založil a nevie ich nájsť. Zuzana rieši svoj nový biznis a má dohodnuté stretnutie so Švajdom, aby jej poradil, ako nakrúcať profesionálne videá. Kým Marta nájde virguľou stratené vstupenky, chlapi musia ísť na zápas do Košíc autom, ktoré sa však pokazí. Uvidia László s Františkom aspoň niečo zo zápasu v televízi, keď v dome prebieha aj revízia elektrických rozvodov? Ako dopadne návšteva Patrika Švajdu, keď sa o nej dozvie Marta aj Ildikó, ktorá je jeho nadšený fanúšik?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Jelenia oslava: František sa opäť nezhodne so Zuzanou. Plánovaná oslava jubilea prvej trofeje sa zmení na obed v lacnej poľovníckej reštaurácii. Chlapi dostanú odstupné z Lesnej správy. Susedia chystajú pre Františka prekvapenie, tajne vojdú cez balkón a schovajú sa. Po návrate domov Zuzana v hádke všetkých ohovorí. Vyžehlia sa urážky varením jelenieho gulášu? Františka poteší, že Farkašová nezabudla na jeho výročie. Dozvie sa však, že Lászlove odstupné je nepomerne vyššie ako to jeho. Ako je to možné? Podarí sa zachrániť oslavu jubilea? A ako bude chutiť guláš, ktorý dovarila Ildikó?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Krstný otec: Milka má problém, krstní rodičia sú veľmi „vlezlí“ a rozmaznávajú Evana. Zuzana zistí, že nemajú dosť peňazí na dovolenku. Chce, aby si František požičal od Lászla. Milka chce, aby Lászlovi a Ildikó vysvetlili, že k nim nemôžu tak často chodiť na dlhé návštevy. Ildikó nabalila ďaľší balík vecičiek zo secondhandu pre Evana. František a Ildikó spoločne organizujú deň detí Miestneho úradu a sexy referentka prinesie Lászlovi peniaze na zabezpečenie účinkujúcich. Odpustí Milka Evanovým krstným rodičom? Zvládne László opateru krstňaťa „naostro“? Nájdu sa stratené peniaze?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.desc: Pohreb: Obom rodinám sa podarí zarobiť na krátke dovolenky. Poštár však priniesie šeky na zaplatenie. Nahnevaní susedia ho vyhodia a už ho v živote nechcú vidieť! O to väčší je šok, keď Marta prinesie oznam, že poštár zomrel. Z výčitiek svedomia sa František rozhodne na poštárovom pohrebe zahrať jeho obľúbenú pesničku. Andrejka sa rozišla s Gergelym a bojí sa to povedať Ildikó. Čo mala Marta Sladká s poštárom, keď sa teší na dedičstvo? Ako príjmu pozostalí pesničku pre zosnulého? A ako sa skončí celá táto tragická udalosť?

programme.title: Partička
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.desc: Lekcia: Martina a Richard sa po dvoch rokoch rozhodli rozísť. Ona dostala lákavú pracovnú ponuku v Nemecku, on sa rozhodne zostať na Slovensku a začať nový život. Po čase sa zoznamuje s atraktívnou Timeou, s ktorou všetko vyzerá lákavo. Napokon však zistí, čo je Timea zač...

programme.desc: Battle to Save a Sea Lion. Battling wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring; visiting a rescue centre, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild; an Amazonian duck gets a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue (3)
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle. Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth (6)
programme.sub-title: November-December: Full Circle. Coming full circle on this wild year on Earth.
programme.desc: November-December: Full Circle. Coming full circle on this wild year on Earth.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VI (1)
programme.desc: Hope for the Best. Hope's first orphaned mammal arrives earlier than ever; a mysterious patient from last year is back.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets II (3)
programme.desc: Waiting for Winter. It's November at Cape Tatnam, and though winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay, the ice, which should be forming by now is nowhere to be seen.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets (5)
programme.desc: Devon Island: Land of Ice. Devon Island in Nunavut is the largest uninhabited island in the world; the icy landscape is so barren that NASA uses it to simulate conditions on Mars.

programme.title: The Living Beach (1)
programme.sub-title: Florida. Florida has the most tidal shoreline in the contiguous United States.
programme.desc: Florida. Florida has the most tidal shoreline in the contiguous United States.

programme.title: A Park for All Seasons IV (5)
programme.desc: Killarney Provincial Park. Killarney Provincial Park acted as a battleground early in the environmental movement.

programme.title: A Park for All Seasons IV (6)
programme.desc: Sleeping Giant Provincial Park. Nanabijou's trails may affect dear, wolf, and moose populations.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VIII (21)
programme.desc: Finally free. Three healthy, orphaned baby raccoons arrive; Justine the beaver returns; a raccoon arrives in a predicament.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VIII (22)
programme.desc: CPR. A fawn in need of CPR interrupts the annual fox release; the owls and a seal make great strides.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VI (2)
programme.sub-title: You Otter Know. A muskrat trapped in a fence needs Hopes help.
programme.desc: You Otter Know. A muskrat trapped in a fence needs Hopes help.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife X (1)
programme.sub-title: Frozen Hope. The rehab is flooded with orphaned seals, with some frozen solid in ice.
programme.desc: Frozen Hope. The rehab is flooded with orphaned seals, with some frozen solid in ice.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife X (2)
programme.desc: Lila the Bear. Hope puts everything on the line to save an orphaned black bear cub; two bobcats are ready for release, but they won't go easy.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife X (4)
programme.desc: You're Owl Wet. When a great horned owl arrives covered in oil, Doctor Sherri must put it through a terrifying, life-saving procedure; boxes of young foxes need help and attention.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife X (3)
programme.desc: Harp Seals. Hope's team struggles to help two rescued harp seals learn the natural behaviors they will need to survive in the wild.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife X (5)
programme.desc: A Raccoon, A Ring and Four Rescues. When a tiny piece of trash ruins a raccoon's life, Doctor Jessica cuts it free, but Hope faces tough decisions about its future; a volunteer plunges in to save an injured goose.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife X (6)
programme.desc: Near & Deer. When a tiny fawn gets hit by a car, Doctor Jessica must splint its broken leg or it will never return to the wild; a mother porcupine arrives with baby in tow and both need life-saving attention for a parasitic infection.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife X (7)
programme.desc: Black Bear, Red Tape. Just as Hope is scrambling to get ready for her busiest day of the year, the government decides to seize the bear cub Hope's worked so hard to save.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife X (8)
programme.desc: Hurricane! When a Category 2 hurricane slams straight into the rehab, Hope and her team struggle to protect their patients in the middle of the raging storm.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife X (9)
programme.desc: The Buzzard's Breakfast. On Canada's East Coast is a wildlife rehabilitation center that rehabilitates and releases animals.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife X (10)
programme.desc: Spring. When a worldwide pandemic cripples the rehab, wildlife emergencies keep coming in: a bobcat that's been shot, and a massive adult seal; Hope's down to a skeleton crew as critical team members go into quarantine.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife X (5)
programme.desc: A Raccoon, A Ring and Four Rescues. When a tiny piece of trash ruins a raccoon's life, Doctor Jessica cuts it free, but Hope faces tough decisions about its future; a volunteer plunges in to save an injured goose.

programme.title: Wild Fighters (5)
programme.desc: The Fight for Territory. Territory is home, and the place where animals rest, find food or have their children; many animals mark, protect and defend their small nations against the invasion of strangers because their survival depends on it.

programme.title: Uptown Otters (2)
programme.desc: Home Away from Home

programme.title: Alien Abyss (2)
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries. Feeling the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth's oddest creatures; diving deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons II (1)
programme.sub-title: Namib: Land of Primates. Few creatures can survive in the extremes of the Namib Desert.
programme.desc: Namib: Land of Primates. Few creatures can survive in the extremes of the Namib Desert.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons II (3)
programme.sub-title: The Last Desert Giants. The world's largest land mammal lives in the Namib.
programme.desc: The Last Desert Giants. The world's largest land mammal lives in the Namib.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VI (5)
programme.desc: Any Mom Will Do. Starting up a raccoon adoption agency; Hope tries to make peace between wild enemies; a kidnapped fawn needs to be reunited with its mother.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys: Crossing the Danakil
programme.sub-title: Adventure seekers cross Ethiopia's Danakil Depression to view the Erte Ale volcano.
programme.desc: Adventure seekers cross Ethiopia's Danakil Depression to view the Erte Ale volcano.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys: The Child of Fire
programme.sub-title: Checking the Anak volcano in Indonesia, the child of Krakatoa.
programme.desc: Checking the Anak volcano in Indonesia, the child of Krakatoa.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets II (3)
programme.desc: Waiting for Winter. It's November at Cape Tatnam, and though winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay, the ice, which should be forming by now is nowhere to be seen.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild III (4)
programme.sub-title: How Smart are Sharks? Sharks may be much more intelligent than previously thought.
programme.desc: How Smart are Sharks? Sharks may be much more intelligent than previously thought.

programme.title: A Park for All Seasons III (4)
programme.desc: Pukaskwa National Park. Pukaskwa's unpredictable landscape features boreal forests and iron-rich plutonic rocks.

programme.title: A Park for All Seasons III (3)
programme.desc: Mingan Archipelago National Park. Mingan Archipelago, along the St. Lawrence River, is composed of 30 limestone islands and more than 1,0000 islets.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VIII (19)
programme.desc: Bobcat Release. Hope's three bobcats get released into the wild, and the second baby barred owl arrives.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VIII (20)
programme.desc: The Great Escape. The foxes escape their enclosure; two seals are released into the wild.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VI (1)
programme.desc: Hope for the Best. Hope's first orphaned mammal arrives earlier than ever; a mysterious patient from last year is back.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild (1)
programme.sub-title: Isle Royale. The moose and wolves of Lake Superior battle.
programme.desc: Isle Royale. The moose and wolves of Lake Superior battle.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild (4)
programme.desc: Invaders From the Deep. The Asian carp, an invasive species, travels through North American waters, eating, breeding and decimating native fish populations.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild (5)
programme.desc: The Goby Effect. Researchers continue to fight for the survival of the Lake Erie Watersnake, a species on the brink of extinction; a new source of food could mean the snakes have a future after all, so long as the lake's algae blooms cooperate.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild (6)
programme.desc: Bad Reputations. Some people are fighting to save the endangered massasauga rattlesnake, which was vilified for years.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild (7)
programme.sub-title: Endangered Species. The peregrine falcon population has been rising in numbers.
programme.desc: Endangered Species. The peregrine falcon population has been rising in numbers.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild (8)
programme.sub-title: The Damning Truth. Animals that inhabit waters controlled by dams are put in danger.
programme.desc: The Damning Truth. Animals that inhabit waters controlled by dams are put in danger.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild (2)
programme.sub-title: Creatures of the Night. Flying squirrels leaping through the air.
programme.desc: Creatures of the Night. Flying squirrels leaping through the air.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild (3)
programme.sub-title: Back From the Dead. Sometimes animals get a second chance.
programme.desc: Back From the Dead. Sometimes animals get a second chance.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue (1)
programme.desc: Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family. The team in saves a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose; a visit to the Rescue Centre, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue (2)
programme.desc: Battle to Save a Sea Lion. Battling wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring; visiting a rescue centre, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild; an Amazonian duck gets a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Our Big Blue Backyard III (1)
programme.desc: Tini Heke / Snares Islands. Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea; hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Our Big Blue Backyard III (2)
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula. Setting sail for New Zealand's Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals; watching as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Our Big Blue Backyard III (3)
programme.desc: Top Of The South / Te Tau Ihu. Uncovering a land of opposites atop New Zealand's South Island, where one of the world's longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Our Big Blue Backyard III (4)
programme.desc: Te Moananui A Toi / Hauraki Gulf. Exploring New Zealand's marine reserves during a journey from the north to the deep south.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue (1)
programme.desc: Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family. The team in saves a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose; a visit to the Rescue Centre, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Diesel's Rules

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Treasure! In a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Homeless. After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Camping. An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem – but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chocks Away. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. Next day, his newly constructed fighter plane, almost ready for take-off, sadly lacks a vital part – and the blinking model shop is shut! No matter. It’s chocks away with Teddy at the controls, fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Spring Clean. It's the First Day of Spring and Mr. Bean sets about washing his clothes, his furniture, his teddy and himself. But, alas, there’s no hot water! A bit of inventive improvisation with an outside drainpipe proves Mr. Bean to be greener at D.I.Y. plumbing than he thought.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: No Pets. Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Ray of Sunshine. It’s a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Birthday Bear. Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Bean’s girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bear’s Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Squeaky Clean. Fed up with Tom's cat hair, Rick buys the "Suck-Up," a next level Roomba-like cleaner. The Suck-Up patrols the house and cleans nonstop. At first, Tom enjoys the little modern mechanical marvel using it to clean Jerry out of house and home! But when the self-programming machine turns on them both and takes over the house -- Tom and Jerry team up to defeat it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hop to It! Tom and Jerry have to go retrieve an ingredient for the witches' spell before sundown. Tom sees Princess Toodles and quickly forgets the mission. He competes with Butch in three trials to win over Toodles. Jerry struggles to keep them on track and to help Tom out with the competition.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: For the Love of Ruggles. Tom impulsively kicks Spike's beloved chew toy Ruggles over the fence and has to go get it back when he sees how heartbroken Spike becomes. Things get hard when Ruggles is adopted by an imaginative little girl Matalyn and Tom has to steal him back.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Sleuth or Consequences. Butch and a squirrel detective have set up shop across the street from Tom and Jerry and are stealing all their customers by using high-tech devices to solve crimes. Tom and Jerry challenge them to a competition to solve one final case: either find a goldfish's missing gold chest or close up shop. Something isn't quite right about the Cat and Squirrel Detective agency though..

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Dinner Is Swerved. When Rick and Ginger leave Tom home alone Tom and Jerry decide to invite their lady friends Toodles and Toots over for a romantic dinner. Things don't go as planned when they all start to get in each others' way. Food fights and tempers rise when dinner goes haywire.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Treasure! In a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Homeless. After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Camping. An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem – but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chocks Away. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. Next day, his newly constructed fighter plane, almost ready for take-off, sadly lacks a vital part – and the blinking model shop is shut! No matter. It’s chocks away with Teddy at the controls, fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Crystal Cavern

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Mirror Madness. Wilhelmina steals Queen Ozma's Magic Mirror and becomes so infatuated with her own reflection that she gives up on all her other hobbies. The more she looks in the mirror, the bigger her reflection grows. When Dorothy tries to recover the mirror, the mirror breaks and the "Reflection Beast" is released! To stop her reflection, Wilhelmina must do something "good" and looks to Dorothy to train her in the ways of goodness.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hoverboard. Mike is impressed with Tom's hoverboard tricks and decides to try to master them to impress Iris. As soon as Tom steps out, Mike tries to get his hands on the board but the turtles have other ideas. In fact, everyone seems to want a turn on the hoverboard, including the raccoons. It's the perfect way for them to get their loot from the house to their den. Mike is going to have to step up if he wants to defeat the raccoons and get Tom's hoverboard back.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Wheelers of Fortune. Bricks are disappearing from the Yellow Brick Road. When Dorothy and her friends follow the wheel prints back to the Wheelers hideout, they find that Rustle, the biggest and baddest Wheeler, has been stealing the bricks to cover up the fact that his back wheel is broken. Dorothy brings Rustle to Smith & Tinker to fix his wheel. Overwhelmed with gratitude, Rustle helps them speedily repair the Yellow Brick Road.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Sister Sister. Glinda the Good's twin sister, Melinda the Mean, plans to displace Glinda as the most loved witch in Oz. Melinda thinks that being good can't be hard. But when each of Melinda's "good" deeds shows her true colors, Dorothy and the gang figure out there is an imposter! Now, they not only have to find Glinda, but also prove to the Munchkins that she is the true Good Witch.

No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Birthday Bear. Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Bean’s girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bear’s Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Mole. Mr. Bean’s landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Roadworks. Mr. Bean’s tranquillity is shattered by deafening roadworks outside his bedroom window. Threats, sabotage and subterfuge all fail to quell the cacophony until Bean has the ingenious idea of feeding the workmen into peaceful submission. But the silence ends with a bang!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Sofa. Mr. Bean likes nothing more than to relax on his sofa with a good meal and his favourite telly programme. Unfortunately, a painful explosion of springs under his bottom puts an end to that. He sets about buying another one… but, alas, sofas are expensive items. TV dinners may well be a thing of the past for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Kana and the Butterflies

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider

programme.sub-title: The Big Squeak. Avocado's new toy is driving everyone crazy with its noisy squeaker.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The Old Gray Hair. After discovering a gray hair, Spikes decides he's too old to be the alpha of the house which sends Tom into full bully mode. Jerry will have to act fast to convince Spike he's still the alpha dog.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: (Not) Your Father's Mouse-Stache. It's the battle of the moustaches when Tom accidentally drinks a hair tonic potion left behind by Jerry – and Butch realizes he needs to acquire some facial hair of his own if he is to compete for Toodles and Dollface's attentions.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: Ball of Fame. When Tom and Jerry's antics unearth an autographed baseball – a childhood souvenir of Rick's – he warns Tom to keep his paws off it, or else! Tom attempts to obey, but Jerry's got other ideas and the ball gets out of hand. The guys chase the treasured ball all over the neighborhood, recovering it only to lose it again. And again. And again.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: The Big Balloon Breakout

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: No Parking. Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - 'Titanic'. Now he simply has to park the car. But when you're Mr Bean, nothing's simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Artful Bean. There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Fly. When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, it's war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mime Games. A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI

With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Slinging in the Rain. The storm of the century is brewing -- according to Tuffy and Jerry, that is, who are giving Tom a little payback for tormenting them earlier. Spike also gets caught up in the hysteria over the impending storm. When Spike uncovers the ruse, the mice must brace for their own storm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom-Foolery. Butch tricks Tom into switching places with him and sends Tom off to live the life of a street cat. Butch finds out that living Tom's cushy life isn't what it seems when Jerry makes his life difficult and Ginger's doting is humiliating. Tom finds that living off the street is tricky and difficult. They very quickly switch back to the way it was.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Superfied. Dr. Bigby creates cookies that can give animals superpowers. Jerry and Napoleon sneak some cookies and they have fun terrorizing Tom an alley cat who has broken in to eat them. The tables are turned when Tom gets his hands on the cookies.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Birthday Bear. Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Bean’s girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bear’s Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Mole. Mr. Bean’s landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Roadworks. Mr. Bean’s tranquillity is shattered by deafening roadworks outside his bedroom window. Threats, sabotage and subterfuge all fail to quell the cacophony until Bean has the ingenious idea of feeding the workmen into peaceful submission. But the silence ends with a bang!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Sofa. Mr. Bean likes nothing more than to relax on his sofa with a good meal and his favourite telly programme. Unfortunately, a painful explosion of springs under his bottom puts an end to that. He sets about buying another one… but, alas, sofas are expensive items. TV dinners may well be a thing of the past for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Percy and the Skunks

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Stuck on You. Dorothy presents Ozma with a magical Best Friends necklace (half says best and the other half says friends) that she found while digging in her garden. Ozma is thrilled and puts it on immediately! But what they didn't realize is that the second you put on the necklaces, you're literally joined/connected at the hip! They must find the key to friendship to get unstuck!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Who's The Boss. Tom walks in and catches Mercury trying to break into in the garage. He thinks Mercury would make the cool, exciting pet he's always wanted. To Mike's horror, Tom makes him promise to make sure nothing happens to Mercury while he's at school. Mike, ever the obedient pooch, does his best but the turtles want Mercury out of the house. Mercury is making himself way too comfortable. Mike will need to use all his brainpower to kick the unwanted guest out of the house and enlists Freddy as an unlikely ally.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Trojan Racoons. The raccoons find a brilliant way of getting into the Mikkelsen's house without anyone noticing by getting mailed to the house inside in a cardboard box. Mike falls for it and the raccoons are free to steal whatever they want in their few minutes of freedom inside the house. The racoons skedaddle back to their lair, but instead of stealing the loot, Mercury brings back an old grandfather clock that belonged to the family's grandmother. Now Mike has to break into the raccoon's lair, retrieve the family heirloom and give the raccoons a taste of their own medicine.
