programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Mirror Madness. Wilhelmina steals Queen Ozma's Magic Mirror and becomes so infatuated with her own reflection that she gives up on all her other hobbies. The more she looks in the mirror, the bigger her reflection grows. When Dorothy tries to recover the mirror, the mirror breaks and the "Reflection Beast" is released! To stop her reflection, Wilhelmina must do something "good" and looks to Dorothy to train her in the ways of goodness.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Everything's Coming Up Poppies. It's the Poppin' Poppies Parade and while making a float for Queen Ozma, Dorothy and her friends run out of poppies. When Wilhelmina gives them some of hers, it turns out they're the Wicked Witch's enchanted sleeping poppies, and Wilhelmina is planning to steal Dorothy's Ruby Slippers when she falls asleep. Now, it's up to Tin Man and Scarecrow to get help from the Good Witch Glinda before Wilhelmina steals Dorothy's slippers and all of Oz is put to sleep forever.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: A Cut Above the Rest. Ozma is helping Dorothy get ready for the big Oz Royal Ball, where all the Royals of Oz will meet. Dorothy's worried about remembering all the proper protocol, but luckily Patchwork Girl makes a magic dress that will help her! But when Wilhelmina's monkey minions, Frank and Lyman, sabotage the dress, the animated gown wreaks havoc, starting skirmishes between the royals. How will Dorothy manage to fix the Ball and show she was born to be a princess?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Missing Teddy. Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Bean’s life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: No Parking. Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - 'Titanic'. Now he simply has to park the car. But when you're Mr Bean, nothing's simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Artful Bean. There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Fly. When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, it's war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Nia and the Ducks

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Bloom Patrol. Lucas and his friends are excited to see a flower bloom.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Behind the Door. Lucas finds a door at the base of Arlo’s tree – Who does it belong to?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Picture Imperfect. It's picture day! Spike and Tom end up covered in mud and in the Laundro-mutt grooming van. A fight leads to a runaway van and a bath they both wanted to avoid. Tuffy and Jerry are determined to be included in this year's picture.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: One of a Kind. Tom and Jerry are hired by Polly the Dog get back her collar from park mean guy Barkley.They help put Barkley in the pound jail. He escapes but loses his memory after getting zapped by an electric fence. He clulessly hires Tom and Jerry to help him track down the detective duo that got him caught in the first place! Barkley reforms when he meets Polly and falls in love with her.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Belly Achin'. When Little Quacker finds that his favorite birdbath is cracked he enlists Jerry’s help to get it fixed. They get sidetracked by the scent of Tom’s delicious chinese takeout. After a battle for the food Tom steals Little Quacker’s fortune cookie and gets the best fortune ever! Tom sets out into the world with his newfound luck only to be on the receiving end of miserable luck.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Dog Daze. It's the hottest day ever and Spike is building a swimming pool for his son Tyke. When Tom and Jerry get kicked out of the house for being too destructive Spike enlists their help. Spike must do everything he can from losing his temper in front of Tyke when Tom and Jerry fail to do things the right way.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Birds of a Feather. Ginger is in charge of taking care of her mother's bird. Tom tries his hardest to keep from eating the bird but can't control himself. He gets kicked out by Ginger and feels guilty. Tom and Jerry work together to keep the bird safe from Butch.

programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Findley is Sick. Findley fibs about being sick to avoid chores. Dr. Lucas isn't happy.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.sub-title: Hide N' Seek. The crew plays Hide N’ Seek at headquarters and Tweety is the seeker.
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Missing Teddy. Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Bean’s life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: No Parking. Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - 'Titanic'. Now he simply has to park the car. But when you're Mr Bean, nothing's simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Artful Bean. There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Fly. When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, it's war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Muddy Thomas

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Wand-erful. There's a storm headed for Emerald City and the only thing that can protect them is one of Glinda's protective bubbles. Unfortunately, Glinda the Good Witch's wand is missing! Dorothy takes a break from teaching Toto "fetch" to help Glinda find her wand. As Dorothy and friends re-trace Glinda's steps, Wilhelmina hears about the lost wand. Wilhelmina is one step ahead, and she gets the wand before Dorothy! Now, it's up to Toto to remember what it means to fetch or else it's curtains for the gang!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: No Sleep Sleepover. Dorothy is teaching Queen Ozma and friends about slumber parties! But Wilhelmina is mad that she's been left out of the fun and tries to ruin the party with a giant Pillow Monster. But not only does the Pillow Monster attack the party, he escapes the Emerald Palace and rampages toward Wilhelmina's castle! With some help from the Patchwork Girl, they unstitch the Pillow Man and save Oz.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Lion Catches a Bug. When the Wicked Witch plots to have her winged monkeys invade the Emerald Forest, everyone turns to Lion – the King of the Forest – to rally his troops. But Lion is feeling under the weather. In Oz, when you catch "a bug," you catch a literal bug! This little guy makes himself at home in Lion's ear, forcing Dorothy to take a magical potion that shrinks Dorothy, Tin Man and Scarecrow down so they can go into Lion's ear and get the bug out and save the forest!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Tik Tok and Tin Man. Dorothy and her friends find Tik Tok, a mechanical man, broken down by the side of the road who needs to be repaired! Tik Tok is immediately enamored with Tin Man, thinking he's a great hero. He wants to be just like Tin Man, but since Tik Tok's voice mechanism isn't working, the only way Tik Tok can communicate this is by trying to impress Tin Man. Worried that Tik Tok is going to replace him, the Tin Man's jealously comes to a head when Tik Tok saves the group from the springs of Springfield Mountain. Deciding that he should leave, only Dorothy, Scarecrow and Lion convince him that he can never be replaced.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Stuck on You. Dorothy presents Ozma with a magical Best Friends necklace (half says best and the other half says friends) that she found while digging in her garden. Ozma is thrilled and puts it on immediately! But what they didn't realize is that the second you put on the necklaces, you're literally joined/connected at the hip! They must find the key to friendship to get unstuck!

Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mime Games. A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Spring Clean. It's the First Day of Spring and Mr. Bean sets about washing his clothes, his furniture, his teddy and himself. But, alas, there’s no hot water! A bit of inventive improvisation with an outside drainpipe proves Mr. Bean to be greener at D.I.Y. plumbing than he thought.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: No Pets. Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Ray of Sunshine. It’s a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Muddy Thomas

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Waiting for Maizie. Spring is finally here! Maizie returns after her winter hibernation.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: Hip Replacement. The neighbor's cat turns out to be a hipster whose laidback attitudes and behaviors are soon adopted by Tom and the other alley cats. Annoyed, Jerry decides to put an end to all of their silly nonsense.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show IV
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In the wild. Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Missing Teddy. Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Bean’s life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: One-Way Cricket. Rick blames Tom for letting a cricket into the house. He must get rid of it or he'll be sleeping outside. After Tom nearly destroys the house trying to get rid of the cricket, both the cricket and Tom are thrown outside where the chirping insect soon becomes Spike's problem.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Vampire Mouse. Jerry pretends to be a vampire to scare Tom. Tom balances trying to keep vampire Jerry at bay and helping the witches make a new potion. Now it's up to Tom with the help of his friend Newt to defeat the vampire mouse before it's too late!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Entering and Breaking. When Rick leaves Spike in charge of protecting the house against burglars Spike steps up and trains Tom and Jerry to be his helpers. At first it seems like they are going to fumble their security jobs but then a burglar proves to be no match for our destructive trio.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Franken Kitty. Dr Bigby creates a machine to turn back the hands of time for his beloved cat Wilson. Tom is trying to break into the lab to eat Jerry and Napoleon and accidentally gets mistaken for a young Wilson and is taken home. Tom must convince Dr. Bigby he's got the wrong cat! Jerry and Napoleon are left with the real Wilson who is a mean vicious cat.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Haunted Mouse. Tuffy hires detectives Tom and Jerry to investigate the ghost hauntings in his house. At first Tom and Jerry think it's just his imagination but discover that the house seems haunted. They find out it's a rat who wanted to chase Tuffy out so he could live there with his family but is ok with sharing the home.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mime Games. A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Spring Clean. It's the First Day of Spring and Mr. Bean sets about washing his clothes, his furniture, his teddy and himself. But, alas, there’s no hot water! A bit of inventive improvisation with an outside drainpipe proves Mr. Bean to be greener at D.I.Y. plumbing than he thought.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: No Pets. Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Ray of Sunshine. It’s a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Kana and the Butterflies

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.sub-title: Bear Under Lock And Key. Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: If I Only Had Some Brawn. Ozma has created a fun corn maze with a special treasure at the center. Scarecrow thinks that being super strong will impress the Patchwork Girl so he gets a magical "Get Strong Quick" shirt that makes him a beefy hunk – but at the price of his smarts. When the Nome King steals the treasure from Ozma's maze, Scarecrow must get back his smarts to save the day.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Beast Royales. It's Musical Monday and the Beasts Royale, the most popular band in Oz, are going to perform! Wilhelmina is their number one fan, so sends Frank and Lyman to kidnap them so they can play for her instead! Dorothy, Tin Man, Scarecrow, Lion and Toto aren't about to let Wilhelmina spoil the party, and mount a hair-raising rescue so that the band can get back to the castle to perform.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Ditzy Home. Stephan upgrades the house's security system and it looks like Mike might be able to take a break from playing guard dog. The new system immediately detects when the raccoons are trying to break in and ejects from the property. Mike didn't even have to lift a paw. Unfortunately, the system works a little too well and quickly targets Mike as an intruder too. Now Mike and Freddy are on the same team trying to break in so he can defeat the errant security system and save Mercury and Fluffy who are still trapped inside.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.desc: Too Loud Nia

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In the wild. Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Diesel's Rules

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Avocado's Fan. Arlo is starstruck by Avocado's popularity and becomes her biggest fan.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Waiting for Maizie. Spring is finally here! Maizie returns after her winter hibernation.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Feline Fatale. Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters but Jerry is set on getting Tom in trouble. When Tom uses the magic spell wand and makes all of the furniture come alive he must get the help of Newt to make everything go back as it was.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cat Nippy. Tom and Jerry accidentally get locked out in the snow. They chase each other in the winter wonderland until they realize they can't get back in. They work together to get back indoors as the weather turns ugly.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ghost of a Chance. Tom and Jerry accidentally get locked out in the snow. They chase each other in the winter wonderland until they realize they can't get back in. They work together to get back indoors as the weather turns ugly.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In the wild. Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Nia and the Ducks

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Brain Power of Love. The Scarecrow has lost his smarts. He just stammers and stumbles around the scrappy dressmaker Patchwork Girl. Wilhelmina thinks Patchwork Girl must be a witch and traps her to find the secret of stealing brainpower. Dorothy comes to the conclusion that the Scarecrow is a bit dimwitted around the Patchwork Girl because he likes her. Scarecrow's brilliant plan guides the gang in freeing the Patchwork Girl from Wilhelmina's clutches!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Jinxed. When Ozma and Dorothy say something at the same time, Dorothy playfully calls out, "Jinx!" Suddenly, Lion, Scarecrow, and Tin Man look somber. "Oh no, Dorothy! You can't say that in Oz!" Dorothy and Ozma have lost their voices! They try charades but are comically bad at it. The group must travel the land of Jibber Jab and meet the Yakity Yaks for the antidote.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Rise of the Nome King. After Dorothy finds the Magic Magnifying Glass, the Nome King tricks her into using it on him. But once he's big enough, the Nome King swipes the Magnifying Glass and makes himself a giant who can take over Oz! When Dorothy and her friends realize that the Nome King is afraid of chickens, they decide to use Billina to frighten the Nome King and reclaim the Magnifying Glass. But how will they go up against someone so big?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: One-Winged Wally. Dorothy and her friends find a one-winged monkey who's run away from home. Feeling sorry for the monkey, Dorothy is determined to get him his second wing and asks for Ozma's help. Ozma tries to use her magic to make him a wing, but they don't seem to be the right ones for this Monkey. The gang has to travel to the crooked magician Dr. Pipt to get the right wing. On the way home, the terrible Wheelers attack our gang. When the monkey goes to save them, he realizes that his unique abilities saved the day.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Tik Tok and Tin Man. Dorothy and her friends find Tik Tok, a mechanical man, broken down by the side of the road who needs to be repaired! Tik Tok is immediately enamored with Tin Man, thinking he's a great hero. He wants to be just like Tin Man, but since Tik Tok's voice mechanism isn't working, the only way Tik Tok can communicate this is by trying to impress Tin Man. Worried that Tik Tok is going to replace him, the Tin Man's jealously comes to a head when Tik Tok saves the group from the springs of Springfield Mountain. Deciding that he should leave, only Dorothy, Scarecrow and Lion convince him that he can never be replaced.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: If I Only Had Some Brawn. Ozma has created a fun corn maze with a special treasure at the center. Scarecrow thinks that being super strong will impress the Patchwork Girl so he gets a magical "Get Strong Quick" shirt that makes him a beefy hunk – but at the price of his smarts. When the Nome King steals the treasure from Ozma's maze, Scarecrow must get back his smarts to save the day.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Beast Royales. It's Musical Monday and the Beasts Royale, the most popular band in Oz, are going to perform! Wilhelmina is their number one fan, so sends Frank and Lyman to kidnap them so they can play for her instead! Dorothy, Tin Man, Scarecrow, Lion and Toto aren't about to let Wilhelmina spoil the party, and mount a hair-raising rescue so that the band can get back to the castle to perform.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Gentleman s pistolí
programme.desc: Komedie USA (2018). Film založený na skutečném příběhu Forresta Tuckera (Robert Redford), od jeho smělého útěku z vězení San Quentin ve věku sedmdesáti let až po řadu nevídaných vloupání, která policii vyváděla z míry, nicméně veřejnost okouzlila. Jeho pronásledováním jsou posedlí detektiv John Hunt (Casey Affleck), jehož fascinuje, jak se Forrest věnuje svému řemeslu, a žena (Sissy Spacek), která ho miluje navzdory jeho profesi.

programme.title: Kočka
programme.desc: Komedie USA (2011). Drsnou, protřelou holku, která se živí jako soukromé očko, najme FBI, aby se v přestrojení vetřela do školního dívčího klubu.

programme.title: Čaroděj a bílý had
programme.desc: Akční fantasy film HG/Čína (2011). Režisér Ching Siu-Tung natočil podle staré čínské legendy fantasy film o bylinkáři, který se zamiluje do tisíc let starého bílého hada vydávajícího se za ženu. Jet Li hraje roli kouzelníka, jenž odhalí hadovu pravou identitu a bojuje o záchranu mužovy duše.

programme.title: Profesionál II (4)
programme.desc: Akční seriál Fr. (2013). Vincent, který je na pokraji prozrazení svého krytí, musí zachránit nechvalně proslulého Kosku před všemi nebezpečími, včetně Juliette, která vyšetřuje bankovní loupež... právě v době, kdy překupník začíná dělat Alexovi vážné potíže! Juliette, která je stále na stopě "maskovaného mstitele", se nebezpečně přibližuje k tajemství Hydry...

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: Thriller Irs./USA/VB (2014). Hrdinou filmu Need For Speed je automechanik a milovník rychlé jízdy Tobey . Ve snaze zachránit svou firmu a dílnu se dá dohromady s arogantním ex-závodníkem NASCARu Dinem Brewsterem. Na obzoru je i dobrý obchod, jenže veškeré plány překazí katastrofa při jednom ze závodů a hlavně podraz jeho nového parťáka. Tobey jde neprávem do vězení a podrazák Dino si dál jede jejich byznys jen na sebe. Po dvou letech se Tobey vrací z vězení. Rychlost má stále v krvi a je připraven se pomstít. Rozhodne se Dina dostat v očekávaném závodě, o kterém se na nelegálním okruhu mluví jako o Super Bowlu. Vydává se na neuvěřitelnou akcí nabitou jízdu, aby vůbec stihnul start. Před sebou má celý kontinent, jako nechtěnou společnost pak policii a kupu nebezpečných závodníků, které na něj poslal „jeho kamarád\ společně s vypsanou odměnou. Všechno je proti němu, ale ve světě luxusních aut rozhoduje vedle ručičky na tachometru i odhodlání a vůli-".

programme.title: Pro balík prachů
programme.desc: Drama USA (2020). Bankovní lupič se kvůli své nové lásce chce napravit a vést počestný život. Když si uvědomí, že jsou federální agenti ještě prohnilejší než on, musí vytáhnout do boje a očistit své jméno.

programme.title: Tygři železnice
programme.desc: Akční komedie Čína (2016). Jistý železniční dělník v Číně v roce 1941 vede skupinu bojovníků za svobodu proti Japonsku, aby získal potraviny pro chudé.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: V utajení
programme.desc: Akční film USA (2014). Jack Ryan, jako mladý tajný C.I.A. analytik, odhaluje ruské spiknutí, jehož cílem je zničit americkou ekonomiku teroristickým útokem.

programme.title: Profesionál II (5)
programme.desc: Akční seriál Fr. (2013). Vincent musí francouzské armádě ukrást prototyp revolučního dronu, aby pomohl dopadnout Koskase... Když ho Koskas požádá, aby zlikvidoval Bertranda, o němž se domnívá, že je špeh…

programme.title: Nejvyšší pocta
programme.desc: Drama USA (2019). Film zachycuje boj o získání Medaile cti pro zesnulého letce Williama Pitsenbargera. Pitsenbarger, který zahynul v boji při jedné z nejkrvavějších misí vietnamské války, zachránil mnoho životů, ale byl vyznamenán tím, co jeho rodina a muži, s nimiž sloužil a které zachránil, považovali za menší ocenění.

programme.title: Opravdová kuráž
programme.desc: Western USA (2010). Western pod taktovkou bratří Coenů, jehož hlavním hrdinou je jednooký šerif Rooster Cogburn, který s nikým nejedná v rukavičkách a navíc si i moc rád přihne z láhve whisky. Spolu s mladou dívkou Mattie se vydává do nepřátelského území, aby vypátral a potrestal vraha dívčina otce..

programme.title: Revenant Zmrtvýchvstání
programme.desc: Akční dobrodružný film HG/USA (2015). Leonardo DiCaprio a Tom Hardy jsou hlavními hvězdami velkolepého příběhu zrady a přežití, který byl inspirován skutečnými událostmi a odehrál se v nezmapované americké divočině. Snímek vznikl v režii Alejandra G. Iňárritua.

programme.title: Profesionál II (4)
programme.desc: Akční seriál Fr. (2013). Vincent, který je na pokraji prozrazení svého krytí, musí zachránit nechvalně proslulého Kosku před všemi nebezpečími, včetně Juliette, která vyšetřuje bankovní loupež... právě v době, kdy překupník začíná dělat Alexovi vážné potíže! Juliette, která je stále na stopě "maskovaného mstitele", se nebezpečně přibližuje k tajemství Hydry...

programme.title: Profesionál II (5)
programme.desc: Akční seriál Fr. (2013). Vincent musí francouzské armádě ukrást prototyp revolučního dronu, aby pomohl dopadnout Koskase... Když ho Koskas požádá, aby zlikvidoval Bertranda, o němž se domnívá, že je špeh…

programme.title: Krvavá volba
programme.desc: Drama N/USA/VB/Kan. (2000). Obhájce hájí před soudem důstojníka, který dal svým vojákům příkaz střílet na civilisty, když ti vtrhli na velvyslanectví USA v jedné zemi třetího světa.

programme.title: Avantgarda
programme.desc: Drama Čína (2020). Prvotřídní bezpečnostní agentura Vanguard může být vaší jedinou nadějí, pokud si vás vyhlídli nejnebezpečnější kriminálníci na světě. Během ochrany jednoho z klientů a jeho dcery se ředitel firmy (Jackie Chan) sám zúčastní extrémně složité akce. Ohromující souboj se odehraje na třech kontinentech.

programme.title: Profesionál II (3)
programme.desc: Akční seriál Fr. (2013). Po infiltraci do Koskasovy organizace dostává Vincent svůj první úkol: musí pro svého nového šéfa provést loupež a popravu, přičemž riskuje, že ho zatkne policie... Mise je samozřejmě povinnou zkouškou loajality: nikdo nepracuje pro Černou ruku, aniž by se osvědčil krví! Lola propadne kouzlu Virgila, antiglobalizačního aktivisty, jehož boj k Arturově zděšení obdivuje...

programme.title: Vlčí volání
programme.desc: Thriller Fr. (2018). Nacházíme se v blízké budoucnosti. Francouzská ponorka se ocitla ve stavu nouze. Na její palubě se nacházejí velitel Grandchamp, jeho zástupce D’Orsi a odborník na akustickou analýzu a sonary Chanteraide. Podaří se jim situaci zvládnout, i když nekonvenčním způsobem. Část operace však nadále halí rouška tajemství. Chanteraide totiž zachytil zvuk, který není schopen identifikovat. I přes dočasné suspendování se tedy pouští do vyšetřování. Akce však může přivést jeho zemi i zbytek světa až na pokraj apokalypsy.

programme.title: Velká španělská loupež
programme.desc: Thriller Šp./Fr. (2021). Geniální inženýr Thom právě dostudoval a jeho pozornost upoutal sejf španělské národní banky, který je 100 let starý a jehož zabezpečení zahrnuje i podzemní řeku, jež má v případě pokusu o krádež sejf zaplavit. Když se Thom dozví, že má být v sejfu na pouhých deset dní uložen i legendární ztracený poklad, vymyslí společně s charismatickým obchodníkem s uměním Walterem plán, jak do banky proniknout. Na krádež však mají pouhých 90 minut, kdy bude ostraha sledovat finále Světového poháru ve fotbalu na velkoplošné obrazovce instalované úplně náhodou přímo před průčelím banky.

programme.title: Poslední výstřel
programme.desc: Thriller USA (2021). Válečný veterán a rančer Jim Hanson žije v Arizoně nedaleko mexických hranic. Jednoho dne se řízením osudu stane ochráncem jedenáctiletého přistěhovalce. Chlapec se snaží se svou matkou uprchnout do Států před zabijáky z kartelu.

programme.title: Bourneův odkaz
programme.desc: Thriller USA (2012). Jason Bourne se vrátil do New Yorku, ohrožuje celou CIA a ta začíná konat. Ukončuje programy Black Briar a Outcome, do kterého patří i agent Aaron Cross. I on je určen k likvidaci, stejně jako ostatní agenti rozesetí po celém světě, kde služba operuje. Aron je na tréninkové misi na Aljašce, kde se mu podaří před vrahy uniknout. Musí ale vynaložit veškeré úsilí a využít své schopnosti k tomu, aby všemocnou tajnou organizaci překonal. Ocitá se na útěku, je opět sledován nejmodernější technikou a musí kličkovat mezi sprchou smrtících kulek. Cross se poté shledává s doktorkou Shearingovou, u které kdysi podstupoval léčbu jako agent. Té jediné může věřit. Proti nim stojí šéf tajných operací, který má obrovský zájem na likvidaci všech vylepšených agentů.

programme.title: Profesionál II (4)
programme.desc: Akční seriál Fr. (2013). Vincent, který je na pokraji prozrazení svého krytí, musí zachránit nechvalně proslulého Kosku před všemi nebezpečími, včetně Juliette, která vyšetřuje bankovní loupež... právě v době, kdy překupník začíná dělat Alexovi vážné potíže! Juliette, která je stále na stopě "maskovaného mstitele", se nebezpečně přibližuje k tajemství Hydry...

programme.title: Ďáblova svatyně
programme.desc: Změna je život. Seriál Švéd. (2019). Co může být horšího než být uvězněn na zamčené klinice, kde nic není takové, jak se zdá, a nikdo nevěří, že jste tím, za koho se vydáváte? Co takhle začít mít podezření, že mají pravdu?

programme.title: Ďáblova svatyně
programme.desc: Pravda tě osvobodí. Seriál Švéd. (2019). Co může být horšího než být uvězněn na zamčené klinice, kde nic není takové, jak se zdá, a nikdo nevěří, že jste tím, za koho se vydáváte? Co takhle začít mít podezření, že mají pravdu?

programme.title: Expendables: Postradatelní 2
programme.desc: Thriller N/USA (2012). Barneyho Rosse kontaktuje agent CIA Church, který jej požádá, aby se společně se svými muži vydal do bývalého Sovětského svazu a našel tam něco, co bylo v havarovaném letadle. Neřekne mu však, o co by se mělo jednat. Když muži najdou letadlo a pochopí, co mají vzít, ocitne se najednou jeden z nich v zajetí. Pokud mu Barney nedá hledanou věc, rukojmí zemře.

programme.title: Rozpolcená
programme.desc: Thriller N/USA (2022). Bohatý rozvedený muž Chris se zamiluje do záhadné Sky. Záhy se však společně s bývalou ženou a jejich dítětem ocitá v pasti. Čeká je zoufalý boj o život.

programme.title: Profesionál II (3)
programme.desc: Akční seriál Fr. (2013). Po infiltraci do Koskasovy organizace dostává Vincent svůj první úkol: musí pro svého nového šéfa provést loupež a popravu, přičemž riskuje, že ho zatkne policie... Mise je samozřejmě povinnou zkouškou loajality: nikdo nepracuje pro Černou ruku, aniž by se osvědčil krví! Lola propadne kouzlu Virgila, antiglobalizačního aktivisty, jehož boj k Arturově zděšení obdivuje...

programme.title: Profesionál II (4)
programme.desc: Akční seriál Fr. (2013). Vincent, který je na pokraji prozrazení svého krytí, musí zachránit nechvalně proslulého Kosku před všemi nebezpečími, včetně Juliette, která vyšetřuje bankovní loupež... právě v době, kdy překupník začíná dělat Alexovi vážné potíže! Juliette, která je stále na stopě "maskovaného mstitele", se nebezpečně přibližuje k tajemství Hydry...

programme.title: Bitva o Inčchon
programme.desc: Válečný film J. Kor. (2016). Skupina vojáků bojuje v korejské válce rozhodující bitvu o Inčchon.

programme.title: VIY: Tajemství dračí pečeti
programme.desc: Akční fantasy film Čína/USA (2018). Neuvěřitelné příběhy, kouzla, skvělé herecké obsazení. Anglický kartograf dostává od cara zakázku - namalovat mapu Dálného Východu Ruska. Během dlouhé cesty plné úžasných zážitků se dostává až do Číny. Během putování se setkává s mistry bojových umění, čínskými princeznami, Dračím králem a objevuje záhady dračí pečeti.

programme.title: Muž ve stínu
programme.desc: Thriller N/VB/Fr. (2010). Thriller Muž ve stínu z pera mistra historických románů Roberta Harrise přináší napínavý příběh spisovatele, který je najat na sepsání pamětí bývalého britského premiéra. Děj začíná nabírat nebezpečné obrátky krátce poté, co na opuštěnou zimní pláž známého amerického letoviska vyplaví moře mrtvolu jeho předchůdce na tomto literárním projektu. Netrvá dlouho a "muž ve stínu" si uvědomí, že přijetím atraktivní práce učinil strašlivou chybu: ukazuje se, že expremiér je muž, v jehož minulosti se skrývají tajemství, která mají sílu zabíjet.

programme.title: Profesionál II (2)
programme.desc: Akční seriál Fr. (2013). Vincent Liberati v podání Vincenta Elbaze se potýká s nevyléčitelným nádorem na mozku. Aby mohl být na blízku své dospívající dceři Lole a bývalé manželce Alexandře, opouští napínavý a nebezpečný život tajného agenta a vrací se zpět do Marseille. Jedinou šancí na Vincentovo uzdravení je experimentální léčba, kterou mu nabízí záhadná státem řízená organizace Hydra výměnou za spolupráci. Vincent nabídku přijme a zapojí se do boje s organizovaným zločinem za použití nelegálních prostředků.

programme.title: Okrsek 13
programme.desc: Akční sci-fi komedie Fr. (2004). Paříž, rok 2013. Elitní francouzský policista Damien je mistrem bojových umění. Dokáže dokonale infiltrovat zločinecké prostředí a své operace zakončuje rychle a precizně. Nyní je pověřen dosud nejextrémnější misí. Nejmocnějšímu gangu byla odcizena velmi ničivá zbraň. Damien bude muset proniknout do podsvětí a zabránit zkáze.

programme.title: Okrsek 13: Ultimátum
programme.desc: Akční film Fr. (2009). Okrsek 13, o dva roky později. Vláda se změnila, zbytek však nikoliv. Zeď okolo ghetta je stále vyšší, širší a silnější. Čím dál četnější gangy posilují svůj vliv. Nejčastěji probíhají spory mezi pěti etnicky odlišnými okrsky vedenými nemilosrdnými šéfy. Kdo se odváží do jámy lvové?

programme.title: Trable s ex
programme.desc: Komedie USA (2017). Otec workoholik se rozhodne krátce navštívit svou dceru v Los Angeles, ale ta, jak se zdá, zmizela. Spojí se tedy s jejím nemotorným expřítelem a celou noc ji hledají.

programme.title: Pro balík prachů
programme.desc: Drama USA (2020). Bankovní lupič se kvůli své nové lásce chce napravit a vést počestný život. Když si uvědomí, že jsou federální agenti ještě prohnilejší než on, musí vytáhnout do boje a očistit své jméno.

programme.title: Avantgarda
programme.desc: Drama Čína (2020). Prvotřídní bezpečnostní agentura Vanguard může být vaší jedinou nadějí, pokud si vás vyhlídli nejnebezpečnější kriminálníci na světě. Během ochrany jednoho z klientů a jeho dcery se ředitel firmy (Jackie Chan) sám zúčastní extrémně složité akce. Ohromující souboj se odehraje na třech kontinentech.

programme.title: Profesionál II (3)
programme.desc: Akční seriál Fr. (2013). Po infiltraci do Koskasovy organizace dostává Vincent svůj první úkol: musí pro svého nového šéfa provést loupež a popravu, přičemž riskuje, že ho zatkne policie... Mise je samozřejmě povinnou zkouškou loajality: nikdo nepracuje pro Černou ruku, aniž by se osvědčil krví! Lola propadne kouzlu Virgila, antiglobalizačního aktivisty, jehož boj k Arturově zděšení obdivuje...

programme.title: Nevědomí
programme.desc: Sci-fi film USA (2012). Planeta Země už dávno není obyvatelná. Lidstvo bylo napadeno vetřelci a rozhodlo se bránit. Použilo jaderné zbraně a v důsledku toho je svět neobyvatelný. Lidstvo bylo nuceno přesunout se na Saturnův měsíc Titan, kde byla vybudována dočasná vesmírná stanice. Jack a Victoria už pět let slouží na Zemi jako údržbáři. Starají se o bezpečí obřích hydrověží, které odčerpávají energii z mořské vody. Za pár dní, až skončí služba, se oba vydají na Titan. Victoria už se nemůže dočkat, ale Jack má pořád jakési zvláštní pocity sounáležitosti k Zemi, nemluvě o divných snech, které ho pronásledují. Při plnění svojí mise je svědkem nouzového přistání kosmické lodi, jejíž jediná členka posádky tvrdí, že ji s Jackem pojí společná minulost. Její příchod spustí řadu událostí, které Jacka donutí pochybovat o všem, co doposud věděl. Osud lidstva je nyní v jeho rukách.

programme.title: Slídil
programme.desc: Thriller USA (2014). Sociopat Lou Bloom (Jake Gyllenhaal ) je reportér na volné noze, který natáčí videa trestných činů v jejich syrovosti pro zpravodajskou stanici v Los Angeles. Lou stírá hranice mezi účastníkem a pozorovatelem, aby se stal hvězdou svého vlastního příběhu. Jak daleko je ochoten zajít…?

programme.title: Barbar
programme.desc: Dobrodružný historický film Dán./VB (2009). Kolem roku 1000 našeho letopočtu je One Eye, němý bojovník s nadpřirozenou silou, držen jako vězeň skandinávským náčelníkem Bardem. S pomocí chlapce - otroka Areho zabije One Eye svého únosce a společně s Arem se vydá na cestu do srdce temnoty. Při svém útěku se oba nalodí na vikingskou loď, ale ta je brzy pohlcena nekonečnou mlhou, která opadne až tehdy, když posádka spatří neznámou zemi. Jak nový svět odhaluje svá tajemství a Vikingové stojí tváří v tvář svému nelítostnému a krvavému osudu, objeví One Eye své pravé já.

programme.title: Profesionál II (2)
programme.desc: Akční seriál Fr. (2013). Vincent Liberati v podání Vincenta Elbaze se potýká s nevyléčitelným nádorem na mozku. Aby mohl být na blízku své dospívající dceři Lole a bývalé manželce Alexandře, opouští napínavý a nebezpečný život tajného agenta a vrací se zpět do Marseille. Jedinou šancí na Vincentovo uzdravení je experimentální léčba, kterou mu nabízí záhadná státem řízená organizace Hydra výměnou za spolupráci. Vincent nabídku přijme a zapojí se do boje s organizovaným zločinem za použití nelegálních prostředků.
